Client

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • Client.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Movable, java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, EnemyBoss, Item, MagicBolt, NPC, Player, TileBlock

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
implements Drawable, Movable
    Basis Klasse für alle gezeichneten Objekte mit Ausnahme der Enviroment *
    See Also:
